header.name: Kill the GM!
header.author: Josh Archer (converted by System Converter)
header.description: Office-crawl parody with werehumans, Chair Wizard, and a GM boss. One square ≈ 10 ft.

rooms.name: 1. Lobby
rooms.description: Glyph on locked east door; Secretary; cursed MLM paraphernalia.

rooms.name: 2. Werehumans
rooms.description: 10 werehumans busy sending. Chair Wizard appears with Rod of Rebooting if sendings stop.

rooms.name: 3. Supplies
rooms.description: Sending components. Paper-shredder trigger under floor—spinning blades rise from floor.

rooms.name: 4. Toilet
rooms.description: Secret hole behind toilet.

rooms.name: 5. Breakroom
rooms.description: Employee lunch labeled 'C.W.' triggers 2' pit trap. Fridge takes lunch back; guilt.

rooms.name: 6. Sendroom
rooms.description: Note 'Meeting in CR.' Components cause a real-life call to ex (out-of-game gag).

rooms.name: 7. CR
rooms.description: Werehumans (9) watch a Werehuman present; won't engage unless provoked.

rooms.name: 8. Supplies
rooms.description: Shelves; names of elderly townsfolk; Trilby of Confidence (-2 CHA).

rooms.name: 9. I.T.
rooms.description: Chair Wizard; if offered the Trilby, gives Bracers of Carpal Tunnel (+1 AC).

rooms.name: 10. Sendroom
rooms.description: Werehumans (16) busy sending.

rooms.name: 11. Sendroom
rooms.description: Two guards recognize a PC from nightclub; on break part-time.

rooms.name: 12. Breakroom
rooms.description: Pit trap near fridge; backup lunch here. Broken shredder—blades rise but don’t spin. Key on shredder.

rooms.name: 13. H2Office
rooms.description: Water elemental with nametag 'Slippery When Wet'. Offers free samples.

rooms.name: 14. Breakroom
rooms.description: Werehumans (3): 'Have you heard the pitch yet?'

rooms.name: 15. Sendroom
rooms.description: Werehumans (13). One stares at a leak in upper SE corner.

rooms.name: 16. Guards
rooms.description: Two guards near narrow bridge over crevasse.

rooms.name: 17. Reception
rooms.description: Narrow bridge over crevasse. Secretary. Glyph on locked door; sticky note.

rooms.name: 18. GM Boss
rooms.description: General Manager: eye stalks, bug arms, thumb legs. Bathroom-stall tune; hidden east wall and elevator to south. Scroll of Micromanagement, Scroll of Business Certification (named), DVD of 'The Secret'.

rooms.name: 19. Hallway
rooms.description: Dark hallway. Phrase to elevator is in #18; wrong phrase causes door to shut and lock; air is sucked from room.

rooms.name: 20. Exit Elevator
rooms.description: Elevator; pass phrase from #18. Wrong phrase triggers lockdown and vacuum.

doors.notes: Reception → GM door with glyph; sticky note nearby.
Requires correct pass phrase from #18; wrong phrase locks and vents air.

game_elements.name: Random Trap Table (d4)
game_elements.notes: 1: Meeting 1d6 rds (CR). 2: Hold mug in dominant hand 1d4 rds. 3: Shout 'Hump day!' 1d6 rds. 4: Become a Werehuman 1d6 rds; report to 13.

game_elements.name: Paper-shredder floor blades
game_elements.notes: Trigger in #3; spinning blades rise from floor.

game_elements.name: 2-foot Pit Trap (C.W. lunch)
game_elements.notes: Trigger when interacting with C.W.-labeled lunch in #5.

game_elements.name: Breakroom Pit Trap
game_elements.notes: #12 pit trap by fridge; backup lunch here.

game_elements.name: Broken Shredder (rises only)
game_elements.notes: #12; blades rise but don’t spin. Key sits on shredder.

game_elements.name: Reception Glyph Door
game_elements.notes: Glyph-locked door at #17 east; secretary present.

game_elements.name: Lobby Glyph Door
game_elements.notes: Glyph on locked door from #1 to #2.

game_elements.name: Trilby of Confidence (-2 CHA)
game_elements.notes: Found in #8; can be traded to Chair Wizard in #9.

game_elements.name: Chair Wizard
game_elements.notes: In #9; offers Bracers of Carpal Tunnel (+1 AC) if given Trilby. Appears in #2 with Rod of Rebooting if sending stops.

game_elements.name: General Manager (GM)
game_elements.notes: Boss in #18; loot: Scroll of Micromanagement, Scroll of Business Certification (named), DVD of 'The Secret'.

game_elements.name: Hidden East Wall Panel
game_elements.notes: #18: reveals secret to east and elevator to south when the tune is whistled.

game_elements.name: Elevator Control
game_elements.notes: #20 exit elevator; requires correct pass phrase (from #18).
